page.title: CLF Export
page.description: Export cell data to CLF (Cell List File) format. These files can be used in cellular network monitoring applications to identify base stations serving the phone

info.appsTitle: Popular monitoring applications using CLF files:
info.iosNote: There is no such application for iOS/iPadOS/watchOS because Apple does not allow monitoring such things from the application level

form.operatorsHint: Select one or more operators. If none selected, all operators will be exported
form.standardHint: Optional, all standards are exported by default
form.bandsHint: Optional, all bands are exported by default

exportError: Failed to export CLF file. Please try again
